availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1863-1867

body.p:
Commonwealth of Kentucky
Executive Department
Frankfort June 28th 1865

The Trustees of Transylvania University and the Curators of Kentucky University having laid before me a copy of the Resolutions adopted by each accepting the Consolidation provided for in "an Act entitled "An Act to establish an Agricultural College in Kentucky" "Approved February 22nd 1865" and each of said Universities having by said Resolutions laid before ^me^ assents to and accepted all the provisiions of said "Act"

Therefore, I Thomas E Bramlette Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky prusuant to the provisions of said Act do hereby authorize and empower the Curators of the Kentucky University to organize the Agricultural and Mechanical College of Kentucky in pursuance to the provision of said "Act -- "
In testimony whereof I have caused the seal of the Commonwealth to be hereto affixed -- this 28th day of June 1865 -- and seventy fourth year of the Commonwealth: ^done^ at The City of Frankfort.

Thos E Bramlette
Gov of Ky
By the Governor
Secty of State

Kentucky University
&
Transylvania University
acceptance of Act Organizing Agricultural and Mechanical College
&
Governors authority to act 148, 149 & 150
filed & entered on E Journal page
28th June 1865
